strings: <voice_0x01001BAA><se_low>Morrie: You like it, ay? I erect this statue here over my molto monstrous pit so the world can know of the GUSTO and PASSION inside you, ragazzo.
<voice_0x01001BAB><se_low>Morrie: Like I tell you before, you make my dream to come true. And this dream, I have it for a very, very long time.
<voice_0x01001BAC><se_low>Morrie: So now it is for I, Morrie, to help to make your dream to come true, ragazzo.

<voice_0x01001BAD><se_low>Morrie: I come with you on your avventura!
You like this plan, si?
<voice_0x01001BAE><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! I knew you would say this!

<voice_0x01001BAF><se_low>Morrie: I do not know what is your dream, ragazzo.
But I DO know that I, Morrie, will play a
molto importante role in it becoming true!
Morrie joins the party!
<voice_0x01001BB0><se_low>Morrie: So, ragazzo, lead the ways!
<voice_0x01001BB1><se_low>King Trode: Well, it would seem I've accumulated a somewhat larger entourage since we left Trodain.
<voice_0x01001BB2><se_low>King Trode: Henceforth, I think it would be prudent if one or the other of you remained behind to guard Medea and I whenever the rest of the party leaves the wagon.

<voice_0x01001BB3><se_low>King Trode: Yes, I know what you're thinking <endash> but one will be quite sufficient. And I daresay it will stop you tripping over each other in those cramped caves you like to frequent.

<voice_0x01001BB4><se_low>King Trode: Naturally, if whoever is on guard duty is
carrying an important item, I'll see that it
gets transferred to the bag before the rest
of you set off.
<voice_0x01001BB5><se_low>Morrie: I will make the great companion of travelling, ay. Just you wait in the sea!
<voice_0x01001BAE><se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! I knew you would say this!

<voice_0x01001BAF><se_low>Morrie: I do not know what is your dream, ragazzo.
But I DO know that I, Morrie, will play a
molto importante role in it becoming true!
<voice_0x01001BB6><se_high>Marrie: Er...Morrie, darlin', I think he said he didn't want you taggin' along, didn't he?
<voice_0x01001BB7><se_low>Morrie: Che? No no no NO! Think of the GUSTO I will bring to your banda of brothers, ay?

<voice_0x01001BB8><se_low>Morrie: No no no, do not say these words!
Take me with you.
<voice_0x01001BB9><se_low>Morrie: I will do everything in my powers to help you on your quest. Say si, per favore. I beg to you!
<voice_0x01001BBA><se_low>Morrie: Hmph, I see... Va bene, if you are this determined, I do not force your hands, ay.
<voice_0x01001BBB><se_low>Morrie: But, one day you may need the GUSTO only I, Morrie, can bring to your party. When that day comes, you find me here, ay?
<voice_0x01001BBC><se_low>Morrie: I am waiting for you in this place until then, ragazzo.
<voice_0x01001BBD><se_low>Morrie: Ah, ragazzo! You have the change of heart, ay?
<voice_0x010013C3><se_high>Red: Awright, I'll see you lot on the boat, then.
<voice_0x01000A65><se_low>King Trode: I shall await you by the carriage.
<voice_0x01000A66><se_low>King Trode: Cheerio!
